Question: Which of the following statements are true regarding the relationships in *Once Upon a Time in Hollywood*?
Options:
A. a) Sharon Tate was a young actress in Hollywood.
B. b) Rick Dalton befriended Sharon Tate in February 1969.
C. c) Rick Dalton considered making spaghetti Westerns.
D. d) Rick Dalton was a successful actor in the 1960s.
Answer: a) Sharon Tate was a young actress in Hollywood., b) Rick Dalton befriended Sharon Tate in February 1969., c) Rick Dalton considered making spaghetti Westerns.

Question: Which of the following statements are true regarding the relationships in *Once Upon a Time in Hollywood*?
Options:
A. a) Sharon Tate was friends with Rick Dalton.
B. b) Rick Dalton starred in the Western show Bounty Law.
C. c) Sharon Tate was married to director Roman Polanski.
D. d) Rick Dalton directed Bounty Law.
Answer: a) Sharon Tate was friends with Rick Dalton. b) Rick Dalton starred in the Western show Bounty Law. c) Sharon Tate was married to director Roman Polanski.
